Package runtimeModels

Class BetaRuntimeImpactModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • runtimeModels.BetaRuntimeImpactModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DVFSRuntimeImpactModel

    public class BetaRuntimeImpactModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements DVFSRuntimeImpactModel
    This class implements a model that determines the adjusted runtime of a BachJob on the basis of a measure of memory-boundedness (beta) of the job.
    Author:
    nilsw

      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double> betaMap

      • getAdjustedRuntime

        public int getAdjustedRuntime​(double adjustedFrequency,
                              double currentFrequency,
                              int remainingRuntime)
        Description copied from interface: DVFSRuntimeImpactModel
        Retrieves the adjusted runtime of a BatchJob dependant on the current remaining runtime and the new execution frequency of the job.
        Specified by:
        getAdjustedRuntime in interface DVFSRuntimeImpactModel
        Parameters:
        adjustedFrequency - New execution frequency of the job.
        currentFrequency - Current execution frequency of the job.
        remainingRuntime - Currently remaining runtime in simulation time of the job.
        Returns:
        Adjusted remaining runtime of the job in simulation time.
